Texts.Chs: ^orange;Frackin'Universe数据库^reset;可显示出^green;萃取设备^reset;对于不同物质的产生结果。如果你不知道如何生成某种物质或是不知道这种物质可以生成什么，请使用^orange;Frackin'Universe数据库^reset;！
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Lab Directory^reset; does only one thing: ^green;Telling you what makes what^reset; in your extractor and xeno lab. If you need ingredient X but don't know how to get it...check here!
